page.title: 17BEACH AMENITIES SURVEY.
page.content: We interviewed 53 people one afternoon at access points to the beach areas already surveyed.They were grouped together as (a)residents of Tynemouth/ Cullercoats/Whitley Bay. (b)residents of the North East area(but not the above) (c)tourists to coastal area. 1.ARE THERE ANY PARTICULARLY GOOD FACILITIES THAT THIS COASTAL AREA OFFERS TO RESIDENTS AND VISITORS? A pleasant,clean area with good walks and an excellent coastline.An excellent beach with good pubs,hotels,parks, nightclubs,amusements and many sites of general interest.Swimming pools,tennis courts and playing fields are all close by.There is a variety of good food available with plenty of activities(if you can find them!).Amusements keep the young occupied. 2.ARE THERE ANY FACILITIES IN THIS
